barcode.description: barcode that labels the data on the EPIC array; can be used to link to full EPIC array

foliocc.description: Original ELEMENT study ID, unique to an individual child

PedBE.description: PedBE (Pediatric-Buccal-Epigenetic) Clock for children (estimated from DNA methylation data; McEwen et al. 2020)

ageAcc2.PedBE.description: PedBE Clock, residuals after regressing on chronological age

Wu.description: Wu's Clock for children (estimated from DNA methylation data; Wu et al. 2019)

ageAcc2.Wu.description: Wu's Clock, residuals after regressing on chronological age
